name: Solitaire Mania
description:
This is a Solitaire Classic game and this application adds a new card upgrade system, players can collect gold coins to contribute to a gorgeous transformation of the 52 cards.


Summary
1,Click or drag to move cards. In the setting interface,players can choose the settings of draw cards according to their preferences.
2,The game Ranking List records the status of all players on the day of the points, you can view your world rankings.
3,Players can collect gold coins by means of playing the Solitaire free game,ranking list,daily bonus and opening gift box.
4,Gold coins can be used for purchasing cards,unlocking subjects and animations.

The Solitaire games are free for all the card masters,don't you want to try this fun card games?
